sent.orig: Software consists of commercial software, public domain software, shareware and free software in legal state.
sent.trans: 按软件的法律形态来分，它可分为商业软件、公共软件、共享软件和自由软件。

sent.orig: Generally software can be divided into three types: system software, application software and support software.
sent.trans: 通常软件被划分成三类：系统软件、应用软件和支撑软件。

sent.orig: Software, Web Designers, Staff Management Software, Web Developer Software, Staff Management Software, Web Developer Web Designers.
sent.trans: 采购产品软件，网络设计师，人事管理软件，网络开发软件，人事管理软件，网络开发的网页设计师。

sent.orig: Then, system software is designed with modular method, including MCUcontrol software and upper computer software.
sent.trans: 按照模块化的思想设计了系统软件，包括单片机控制软件和上位机可视化控制软件。

sent.orig: Sharing software and free software development, web design, custom software industry, providing effective solutions.
sent.trans: 开发共享软件和免费软件、网页设计，定制行业软件，为企业提供有效的解决方案。
